original_text: Did you, Job, give horses their strength? Did you give them the long hair that they have on their necks? Did you, Job, give horses their strength? Did you give them the long hair that they have on their necks? Did you, Job, give horses their strength? Did you give them the long hair that they have on their necks? Did you, Job, give horses their strength?
korean_text: 말의 힘을 네가 주었느냐 그 목에 흩날리는 갈기를 네가 입혔느냐

sentences.original_text: Did you, Job, give horses their strength?
Did you give them the long hair
that they have on their necks?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 목에 가지고 있는 그 털을?

sentences.original_text: Did you, Job, give horses their strength?
